transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Haa?
Haa, Mr. Vikas baat kar rahe hain?
Yes sir.
Haa, good morning Mr. Vikas, main Suresh baat kar raha hun business manager India Mart se.
Bolo.
Ji aapko sir ek call ka feedback aaya tha kal Dipanjali ke saath aapka discussion hua tha.
Sir aap bhi call mat karo, veh ke do ghante ke baad call karo.
